english.segment1: If shame had a face. I think it would kind of look like mine. If it had a home. Would it be my eyes. Would you believe me. If I said I am tired of this. Now here we go now one more time
english.segment2: Chorus: I tried to climb your steps. I tried to chase you down. I tried to see how low I could get down to the ground. I tried to earn my way. I tried to change this mind. You better believe I tried to beat this
english.segment3: When will this end. It goes on and on. Over and and over and over again. Keep spinning around. I know it won't stop till I step down, From this for good
english.segment4: I never thought I'd end up here. I never thought I'd be standing where I am. I guess I kind of thought it would be easier than this. I guess I was wrong. Now one more time
english.segment6: When will this end. It goes on and on. Over and and over and over again. Keep spinning around. I know it won't stop till I step down, From this sick cycle carousel
english.segment7: This is a sick cycle carousel. This is a sick cycle, yeah (2x)
english.segment8: When will this end. It goes on and on. Over and and over and over again. Keep spinning around. I know it won't stop till I step down, From this sick cycle carousel
